The Centre for New Opportunities

The Centre for New Opportunities has responsibility for managing the corporate profile, marketing and recruitment, alumni relations, major events, educational business and community partnerships, widening participation, training and consultancy services and other third stream activities.
The Head of the Centre for New Opportunities is Celia Moran, the Director of Development.
For more information contact Tania Clarke on 0113 283 7304 or email t.clarke@leedstrinity.ac.uk
